definitions.text: (superlative of `many' used with count nouns and often preceded by `the') quantifier meaning the greatest in number
the superlative of `much' that can be used with mass nouns and is usually preceded by `the'; a quantifier meaning the greatest in amount or extent or degree
examples: made the most money he could
made the most of a bad deal
the king cobra is the most dangerous snake

definitions.text: (of actions or states) slightly short of or not quite accomplished; all but
examples: the baby was almost asleep when the alarm sounded
the car all but ran her down
virtually all the parties signed the contract
I was near exhausted by the run
